name: Quicken Mac Transfer File
summary: Learn about .QMTF files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: QMTF files are created when you export data from Quicken. To export the QMTF file select File â†’ Export and choose "Export to Quicken 2007" or "Quicken Mac 2007 Transfer File (QMTF)..." You can then select the date range of the data you want included in the QMTF file.
NOTE: QMTF files are similar to .QIF files, which are also used for transferring financial data in a text format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
